name: Identifying Iranians
author: Vahidd

sections.description:
identifying iranians ips. this plugin gives you widget, function and shortcode to identifying iranians.

GeoIP database

This plugin are using GeoIP database from maxmind for get users countries from their ips.It is safe and users data are not save in nowhere.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How this plugin Identifying users country

It is using GeoIP database.
